title: Valhalla Bot
description: A passion project of mine that I have been working on for over a year now. Valhalla bot is a Discord bot for a FC Mobile game community.
features: Custom community commands, MongoDB integration, and tailored features for the FC Mobile game community.

title: Leafybucks
description: I need to be better at managing my money, so I thought why not build a nice little web app for this that can track my expenses and see how much I'm spending on doordash each month.
features: Expense tracking, budget management, category analysis, and spending trends visualization.

title: Study Genius
description: My very first hackathon project. 24 hours to build a web application to help you study for your exams faster and more efficiently.
features: ChatGPT-powered flashcard generation backed by Firestore.

title: FÚTBOL DEX
description: A Discord bot that my friend was getting bored of, so they asked me if I could make a better one. Challenge accepted.
features: GCloud-powered bot with a Django website and custom API endpoints so designers can upload cards from the site and the bot can spawn them randomly.

title: Valhalla World Cup Spinner
description: A fun event tool I vibe-coded one night for the Valhalla FC community to assign random World Cup countries to players.
features: React frontend and Python backend connected to a database of players. Shows their Discord icon and assigns a random country, then saves the result.

title: Birthday Countdown
description: A gift for my girlfriend: a countdown timer that reveals a secret video when it hits zero, with music built in.
features: React-based countdown that updates every second and shows a hidden video when finished.

title: Premier League Match Predictor
description: Massive football fan so I started building a model to predict Premier League match outcomes using recent form and injuries.
features: Predicts match outcomes based on team performance data using simple ML models.
